experiences.title: Photographer
experiences.description: Developed photography skills through self-guided learning and personal projects. Focused on capturing high-quality photographs for events and creative works. Built an online portfolio to showcase the work created during this learning phase.

experiences.title: Head of Techformers
experiences.description: Leading and managing the Techformers club, overseeing projects, fostering collaboration among team members, and ensuring the successful execution of initiatives and events. Part-time, on-site role.

experiences.title: Music Producer
experiences.description: Composing, producing, and self-releasing original music across major streaming platforms, including Spotify and YouTube Music. Handling all aspects of production, from music composition to final mixing and mastering.

experiences.title: Programmer
experiences.description: Self-taught in various computer programming languages, system architecture, and server management. Gained extensive experience in software development, problem-solving, and coding techniques through independent study and practical application.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: Collaborated with the Government of Uttarakhand to develop the official AIFSM 2025 website (aifsm2025.in), delivering end-to-end solutions across both frontend and backend. Ensured a robust, user-friendly, and scalable platform to support the event's digital presence.
